results.name: a(n) = n - A162296(n), where A162296(n) is the sum of divisors of n that have a square factor.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
Antti Karttunen, Data supplement: n, a(n) computed for n = 1..65537
mathematica: Array[# - DivisorSigma[1, #] + Times @@ (1 + FactorInteger[#][[;; , 1]]) - Boole[# == 1] &, 83] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Jun 06 2019, after _Amiram Eldar_ at A162296 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Apr 21 2019
